architectural_elements.name: Grand Staircase
architectural_elements.description: A sweeping, ornate staircase with intricate railings and worn-out carpet.

architectural_elements.name: Chandelier
architectural_elements.description: A large, dusty chandelier with flickering candles or broken bulbs, possibly swaying slightly.

architectural_elements.name: High Ceilings
architectural_elements.description: Detailed ceiling moldings, cracks, and peeling paint.

architectural_elements.name: Marble Floors
architectural_elements.description: Cracked or stained marble tiles, with scattered debris or leaves.

architectural_elements.name: Double Doors
architectural_elements.description: Massive, creaking wooden doors with rusty hinges and tarnished brass handles.

furniture_and_decor.name: Antique Side Tables
furniture_and_decor.description: Ornate tables with cobwebs, dust, and possibly a single, half-burned candle.

furniture_and_decor.name: Grand Mirror
furniture_and_decor.description: A full-length mirror with a gilded frame, possibly cracked or showing ghostly reflections.

furniture_and_decor.name: Coat Rack
furniture_and_decor.description: A standalone rack with tattered coats, hats, and umbrellas.

furniture_and_decor.name: Rugs
furniture_and_decor.description: Large, threadbare rugs with moth-eaten patterns or mysterious stains.

furniture_and_decor.name: Wall Sconces
furniture_and_decor.description: Flickering wall-mounted candles or gas lamps.

atmospheric_details.name: Cobwebs
atmospheric_details.description: Hanging from the ceiling, corners, and furniture.

atmospheric_details.name: Dust Particles
atmospheric_details.description: Floating in the air, visible in shafts of light.

atmospheric_details.name: Flickering Lights
atmospheric_details.description: Candles, lamps, or chandeliers that dim and brighten unpredictably.

atmospheric_details.name: Ghostly Presence
atmospheric_details.description: Subtle visual effects like a faint, translucent figure or cold breath in the air.

atmospheric_details.name: Sound Effects
atmospheric_details.description: Creaking floorboards, distant whispers, or the sound of a door slamming shut.

interactive_objects.name: Portraits
interactive_objects.description: Paintings of past inhabitants with eyes that follow the player.

interactive_objects.name: Letter or Journal
interactive_objects.description: A discarded letter or journal on a table, hinting at the mansion’s dark history.

interactive_objects.name: Broken Pocket Watch
interactive_objects.description: A small, intricate pocket watch that doesn’t work, possibly tied to a puzzle.

interactive_objects.name: Key
interactive_objects.description: A rusty key hidden under a rug or inside a drawer, used to unlock another area.

environmental_effects.name: Drafts
environmental_effects.description: Curtains or cobwebs gently moving as if pushed by an unseen force.

environmental_effects.name: Fog
environmental_effects.description: A thin layer of mist near the floor, adding to the eerie atmosphere.

environmental_effects.name: Stains or Blood Splatter
environmental_effects.description: Mysterious stains on the floor or walls, hinting at past violence.

lighting.name: Moonlight
lighting.description: Streaming in through broken or stained-glass windows.

lighting.name: Candlelight
lighting.description: Flickering candles placed on tables, sconces, or the floor.

lighting.name: Shadow Play
lighting.description: Shadows that move unnaturally or seem to take on human-like shapes.
